I have a Fred Beck available for trade or sale.  Will consider trades for T206 commons of similar condition. If you have any, just PM me.  I'm not picky!

Otherwise, asking $SOLD shipped in a plain white envelope on cardboard. Add $2 shipping if you want tracking.

Paypal friends or money order/cashiers check. 

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=290885&d=1507908146[/IMG]
Dropping to $10 in plain white envelope or $12 with tracking.

I'll take it for $10

PM sent
